entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 except minus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low minus 13 except minus 4 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6 except minus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 4 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 29 December 2022
